column5: Will report when we get back.
Good luck to you and be safe out there.
Plan on hitting the whirlpool late at night with a couple of glow in the dark spoons?  Always a good time, and I am sure you'd get some decent action.
via boat or shore???, what ya wanna fish for, and where do ya plan on it..Upper or Lower river???  might be able to help ya out with some pointers, I fished the river since i was like 8-9 years old
Still alittle early for the pool, Salmon are abit behind this year, never know though anytime soon, allways good Smallmouth in the Glen area bring a bunch of Tubes
Appreciate the update bud, I was planning on maybe wetting a line this week, perhaps I'll postpone for a few more
